data.name: QuietMansion1
data.detailed_description:
【Help me】Localize Request

Right now I am developing a horror game by myself.
I would like to make this game available in English, but I do not understand English.
Can someone please localize it for me?
If you localize it, we can put your name in the game!

If you are willing to localize, please contact us at
official Twitter(https://twitter.com/KENGOHAZARD) or
KENGOHAZARD@yahoo.co.jp.
We look forward to hearing from you.


About the Game

■Game Overview

Set in a spooky lodge or laboratory.
And use pistols, rifles, rocket launchers and other weapons to fight monsters and escape.
This is a horror adventure FPS (first person perspective).

■History

Two years ago, a large-scale bio-terrorist attack took place in a certain city.
This bio-terrorism killed more than 170,000 people
The whole world was shocked by the world's worst bio-terrorist attack...
The protagonist miraculously survived the bio-terrorist attack.
He started to search for the truth about bioterrorism under the status of a journalist, based on his experience...
Two years passed.
Then one day he received a phone call.
The call was to reveal the virus used in the bioterrorist attack two years ago...
Suspicious, the protagonist goes to the abandoned house where he is asked to go...

■What's QuietMansion1(QuietMansion Remake)?

"QuietMansion Remake" is the reconstruction of the game, that was distributed in 2018 under "KENGOHAZARD",
with all the contemporary technology and skills
All levels are completely new in order to give the impression of a completely different game

■Full support of 4K HDR

QuietMansion Remake features full support of 4K HDR
Compatibility with 16bit HDR implements a gorgeous presentation that goes beyond usual HDR
Enjoy a different dimension of graphics!

■An evolved image production

Thanks to the success of crowd funding the developer was able to obtain a high-end PC
"Heavy productions and effects that could not be used until now" can now be used freely
An overwhelming image beauty has been realised

■An evolved sound system

Real Sound Effect(RSE) was experimentally introduced to previous works, and received extraordinarily high ratings
Now it's evolved to Enhance Real Sound Effect(ERSE)
Horror productions that featured 3D Space Audio were able to be transformed into completely new horror experiences


  • Title QuietMansion1(QuietMansion Remake)
  • Genre First-Person Horror Adventure
  • Age Target None (in the future CERO rating planned)
  • Distribution Permission Full (This game may be streamed individually or commercially)



Translator:Richard Lenerz
Special Thanks:Tobias Nitsch & Steve Russell

data.short_description: "A nightmare, again..." The high school student who developed all by himself aka KENGOHAZARD, becoming topic of conversations, is doing a remake from scratch! Explore a mansion full of dreadful monsters roaming about, search for keys, and try to escape while striking back with guns!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese*, French*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows8.1
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3/AMD Ryzen™
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 4000(HD-Play)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: You can also play on laptop
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5/AMD Ryzen™
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce® RTX 2060(4K HDR-Play)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: You can feel more realistic by using earphones or headphones

KGSS(K GAME Security System) machine activation limit

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains scenes of blood and violence.
We are careful to avoid grotesque expressions.
No amputated surfaces, etc. will be shown in the film.
